description: Announces its presence by multicasting <<vol2_clause_dev_23_message_hello5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Hello>> messages to all listening systems.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_23_message_hello5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Hello>> messages to identify any <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s that it may exchange messages with and further retrieve a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>'s service capabilities.

Initiates communication by sending <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probe5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Probe>> or <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolve5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Resolve>> messages to <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s. Then listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probe_match5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320ProbeMatch>> and <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolve_match5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320ResolveMatch>> messages to discover those <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s that it intends to exchange messages with and further retrieves the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>'s service capabilities.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probe5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Probe>> and <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolve5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Resolve>> messages, which it responds to with <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probe_match5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320ProbeMatch>> or <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolve_match5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320ResolveMatch>> messages, respectively.
Asks for the resource representation of the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> via the <<vol2_clause_dev_25_message_get_metadata5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320GetMetadata>> message.

Sends its resource representation to the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_consumer>> via the <<vol2_clause_dev_25_message_get_metadata_response5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320GetMetadataResponse>> message.

Initiates communication by first subscribing to a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> by sending a <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscribe5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Subscribe>> message. While the subscription is running, the subscription is kept alive by sending <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_renew5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Renew>> messages and receiving <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_notification5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Notification>> messages.

Finally, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_consumer>> unsubscribes from a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> by sending an <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_unsubscribe5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Unsubscribe>> message.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscribe5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Subscribe>>, <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_renew5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Renew>> and <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_unsubscribe5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Unsubscribe>> messages, which it responds to with <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscribe_response5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320SubscribeResponse>>, <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_renew_response5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320RenewResponse>> or <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_unsubscribe_response5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320UnsubscribeResponse>> messages respectively.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_notification5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Notification>> messages.

When at some point the subscription has to be ended, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> sends a <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscription_end5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320SubscriptionEnd>> message.

label: Notify Change in System Context and Capabilities

description: Listens for a <<vol2_clause_dev_28_message_notification5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Notification>> message to retrieve context updates.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers <<vol2_clause_dev_28_message_notification5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Notification>> messages.
Listens for a <<vol2_clause_dev_29_message_notification5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Notification>> message to retrieve update reports.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers <<vol2_clause_dev_29_message_notification5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Notification>> messages.

Initiates communication by sending a <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdib5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320GetMdib>> message to a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>. Then listens for a <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdibresponse5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320GetMdibResponse>> message to retrieve the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>'s MDIB.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdib5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320GetMdib>> messages, which it responds to with <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdibresponse5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320GetMdibResponse>> messages respectively.
Initiates communication by first subscribing to a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> by sending a {var_label_dev_35_message_subscribe} message.
Listens for {var_label_dev_35_message_subscribe} messages, which it responds to with {var_label_dev_35_message_subscribe_response}.
Listens for a Notification message to retrieve medical data updates.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers Notification messages.

Initiates communication by sending a {var_label_dev_37_message_getmdib} message to a RefActor:somds_provider[]. Then listens for a {var_label_dev_37_message_getmdibresponse} message to retrieve the RefActor:somds_provider[]'s MDIB.
Listens for {var_label_dev_37_message_getmdib} messages, which it responds to with {var_label_dev_37_message_getmdibresponse} messages respectively.
Initiates communication by first subscribing to a RefActor:somds_consumer[] by sending a {var_label_dev_38_message_subscribe} message.
Listens for {var_label_dev_38_message_subscribe} messages, which it responds to with {var_label_dev_38_message_subscribe_response}.
Listens for a Notification message to retrieve medical alert updates.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers Notification messages.

Initiates communication by sending a {var_label_dev_40_message_getmdib} message to a RefActor:somds_medical_data_provider[]. Then listens for a {var_label_dev_40_message_getmdibresponse} message to retrieve the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>'s MDIB.
Listens for {var_label_dev_40_message_getmdib} messages, which it responds to with {var_label_dev_40_message_getmdibresponse} messages respectively.
Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_hello5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Hello>> or
<<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_bye5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Bye>> messages to add or
remove <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> endpoint metadata to/from its
internal database.
When joining a <<acronym_somds>>, it announces its presence to the
<<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_discovery_proxy>>. When deliberately leaving the
<<acronym_somds>>, it announces its absence to the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_discovery_proxy>>.
Forwards <<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_hello5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Hello>>
and <<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_hello5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Bye>>
messages received from <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s.
Responds to incoming <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_probe5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Probe>>
and <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_resolve5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Resolve>> messages.
Uses <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_probe5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Probe>> and
<<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_resolve5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Resolve>>
messages to seek endpoint metadata.
Optionally subscribes to a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_discovery_proxy>> in order
to receive <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_hello5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Hello>>
and <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_hello5a02d771-bfec-4e1b-94fa-a18abb173320Bye>> messages.
